# GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterDetails | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterDetails ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterGroups-_id_-relationships-gameCenterDetails)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterDetails 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterDetails

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterGroups-_id_-relationships-gameCenterDetails#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterDetails
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterGroups-_id_-relationships-gameCenterDetails#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterGroups-_id_-relationships-gameCenterDetails#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterGroups-_id_-relationships-gameCenterDetails#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterGroupGameCenterDetailsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecentergroupgamecenterdetailslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`
